description.@en: From every church, coffee shop and house of ill repute, nothing happens without my knowledge.

data.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: Whenever you succeed in a Fellowship-based Skill Test in urban areas, you can ask for the Historian to give you an important rumor from your investigations you may not have already thought of or overlooked. This benefit cannot be gained more than once a game session.
